Title: PERIOD_ADD()
Description: Add a period to a year-month

Adds N months to period
          P (in the format
          YYMM or
          YYYYMM). Returns a value in the
          format YYYYMM.

Note


            The period argument P is
            not a date value.

This function returns NULL if
          P or N
          is NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT PERIOD_ADD(200801,2);
        -> 200803
